university: University of the West of England (UWE Bristol)
description: This unique three-year part-time Master's Music Therapy course from University of the West of England (UWE Bristol) can lead to registration as a music therapist with the Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC). It also provides a popular route for international students looking to develop their qualifications.

The unique Master’s programme in Art and Science from ITMO University is created for those who strive to overcome any disciplinary boundaries. It allows to obtain scientific and engineering skills essential for artists who are already engaged in the art work and who would like to find new ways of expressing their creative initiatives.
This Film Curating - Master's Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS London is designed to prepare international students for postgraduate study in the UK.
Students on this MA Surface Pattern and Textiles course at University of Central Lancashire (UCLan) cultivate an innovative view of surface design.

The Furniture Design Master offered at POLI.design - Milan (Italy) is based on the capacity of Italian companies, working in the furniture industry, to use design as a fundamental lever of competitive advantage and a structural element of corporate culture.

university: Fontys School of Fine and Performing Arts
description: The Design Studio is the heart of the Urbanism program at Fontys University of Applied Sciences. In the studio students are trained to apply all kinds of skills and methods towards ever more convincing design proposals for complex spatial problems.

The Master in Service Design at POLI.design - Milan (Italy)  was especially created in response to the growing demand for professionals specifically able to handle the complexity of designing a service.
The MA Directing course at MetFilm School Berlin equips you with a comprehensive skillset to work across all screen platforms – film, TV, commercials and online.

course: Communication Design - Book Design - Master's Foundation Programme
description: This Communication Design - Book Design - Master's Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS Reading is designed to prepare international students, who have completed a Bachelor's degree, for entry to postgraduate studies at the University of Reading.

Art History degree offered by the University of Arizona provides a broad based and methodologically critical foundation essential to pursuing a career in Art History, whether in a university or museum setting.
The Master of Arts in Music Education - Conducting at Liberty University can help prepare you for careers in music education or administration in public, private, and higher education.

course: Arts Policy and Management - Master's Foundation Programme
description: This Arts Policy and Management - Master's Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS London is designed to prepare international students for postgraduate study in the UK.

The MRes in Humanities from Keele University has a specific focus on encouraging ground-breaking interdisciplinarity. As part of this ethos, you can develop a unique research project with support across disciplines, learn aes).

Want to sharpen your professional abilities and gain a deeper understanding of various fields of design? Offered at the postgraduate level, this foundational Design course from Torrens University Australia will give you essential practical skills and current theoretical insights.
The Master in Arts Management at Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore offers a unique learning experience preparing students to embark on a management career in the arts and creative industry
Our MA Graphic Communication at University of South Wales is an ideal opportunity to develop your skills and interests by exploring the creative issues and technical aspects of graphic design today.

university: School of Film, Music and Performing Arts
description: Whether you are an established choreographer intent on refining and hot-housing your practice, a dance artist looking to retrain or a recent graduate from a performance-related subject, this Choreography course from Leeds Beckett University will give you the opportunity to find new and innovative ways to produce exciting choreography.

This course is suitable for those who wish to change careers, for qualified Landscape Architects who want to update their skills, or for anyone wanting to undertake an accredited Masters of Landscape Architecture at UTS via the Graduate Certificate in Landscape Architecture from University of Technology Sydney.

The Music - Conducting degree offered by the University of Arizona may be pursued with emphases in composition, ethnomusicology, music education, musicology, music theory, and performance (including accompanying and conducting)
The University of Technology Sydney Master of Animation and Visualisation has been developed in partnership with Animal Logic and is offered through the UTS Animal Logic Academy.

university: University at Buffalo SUNY - School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
description: The University at Buffalo SUNY - School of Engineering and Applied Sciences offers a unique Materials Design and Innovation program on the use of materials informatics that links experimental and computational perspectives of materials science and engineering. Academically qualified students from all fields of science and engineering are welcome to apply.

The Graduate Certificate in Animation and Visualisation at University of Technology Sydney has been developed in partnership with the industry-leading digital animation studio Animal Logic and is offered through the UTS Animal Logic Academy.

The Music - Composition degree offered by the University of Arizona may be pursued with emphases in composition, ethnomusicology, music education, musicology, music theory, and performance (including accompanying and conducting)

This Environmental Design and Engineering programme offered at the University College London (UCL),  explores established, leading edge and emerging themes in built environment study, covered key areas including passive design, efficient building services systems design, advanced building simulation techniques and occupant health and comfort.

The Television Writing and Producing certificate at Humber College prepares you to work as a television writer and producer, and to work in the production offices and on sets of major television shows.
Become the musician you want to be with a flexible taught MMus Music (Musicology, Composition, Performance, Technology) degree offered at The University of Hull.

MSc in Digital Fashion Communication from Università della Svizzera Italiana (USI) is the first digital fashion communication master of its kind in the world. It has been created to fill the existing digital skills gap in fashion business education and to meet the increasing demand for highly trained digital fashion marketers.

course: Creative Enterprise (Art-Communication Design-Film-Theatre) - Master's Foundation Programme
description: This Creative Enterprise (Art-Communication Design-Film-Theatre) - Master's Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS Reading is designed to prepare international students, who have completed a Bachelor's degree, for entry to postgraduate studies at the University of Reading.

Art History degree offered by the University of Arizona provides a broad based and methodologically critical foundation essential to pursuing a career in Art History, whether in a university or museum setting.
The Music - Mixed Composition pathway programme offered by the University of Birmingham aims to foster your skills as you navigate this exciting new world.

course: Film and Television - Research and Production
description: Do you want to develop a broad range of skills that will be directly applicable within the film and television industries? Are you looking to kick-start your career in media production or scholarly research? The Film and Television - Research and Production programme from the University of Birmingham places employability at the heart of the programme.

course: Film Studies (On-Campus or by Distance Learning)
description: The Film Studies (On-Campus or by Distance Learning) programme at University of Birmingham offer promising candidates the opportunity to carry out research in one of the most dynamic institutions in Britain.
The Master of Arts in Music Education - Conducting at Liberty University can help prepare you for careers in music education or administration in public, private, and higher education.

course: Arts Policy and Management - Master's Foundation Programme
description: This Arts Policy and Management - Master's Foundation Programme from ONCAMPUS London is designed to prepare international students for postgraduate study in the UK.

History of art is a rich and dynamic discipline, combining the rigorous investigation of the visual arts with the creative exploration of their connections to culture, politics and society. Postgraduate study in History of Art at Birkbeck, University of London trains you at a high level in looking at, thinking about and researching art and its histories.

course: Film and Screen Media (with Study Abroad)
description: This Master's degree in Film and Screen Media (with Study Abroad) at Birkbeck, University of London explores the history, development and interaction of film, television and other screen media.

The MRes in Humanities from Keele University has a specific focus on encouraging ground-breaking interdisciplinarity. As part of this ethos, you can develop a unique research project with support across disciplines, learn aes).

The Architectural Technology (Fast-Track) program at Centennial College allows qualified graduates with a university degree in architecture (including those from foreign universities) to gain direct admission into the third semester of the three-year Architectural Technology program and receive their diploma in four academic semesters.
This Building Information Management course at University of Portsmouth you’ll cover the fundamentals of project and financial management and learn to integrate exciting new technology.

The Contemporary Theatre, Dance and Dramaturgy programme at Utrecht University welcomes both international students as well as students with a Dutch Bachelor's degree in art and culture studies, but also arts professionals who wish to enrich their practice through academic research.

The Master in Fashion and Luxury Business from EU Business School in Barcelona provides students with an insight into how to build and manage a unique luxury brand. The program encompasses advertising, communication and financial skills in relation to the luxury fashion industry.

course: Teaching at Basic Art Schools - Specialization in Music Edu and Playing a Musical Instrument and Solo Singing
description: This Teaching at Basic Art Schools - Specialization in Music Edu and Playing a Musical Instrument and Solo Singing programme at the University of Hradec Králové is organised in the form of double-subject studies and offers broad knowledge and skills in music theory, developed interpretative skills in a chosen area, developed instrumental skills, teaching methods, and teaching skills.

course: Film and Television Production and Post-Production (Toronto)
description: Get hands-on experience in this Film and Television Production (Toronto) program offered by Trebas Institute, with a variety of projects, including short films, a web series, television broadcasts and commercials.

The Architecture, Engineering and Construction industry (AEC) is changing. If you’re interested in a career in Building Information Modelling/Management (BIM), which is becoming the industry standard for the design, building and management of modern structures, this Building Information Management (Distance Learning) course at University of Portsmouth is for you.

university: Faculty of Creative and Cultural Industries
description: This Interior Architecture and Design course at University of Portsmouth encourages you to engage with interior spaces through creative practice and experimentation, exploring space through material and immaterial matter. The course also supports you to use advanced technologies and to engage with 3D printers.

The Master of Engineering in Civil - Structural Engineering at the Engineering Institute of Technology addresses the specific core competencies and associated underpinning knowledge required of Structural Engineers

university: National Research University - Higher School of Economics (HSE)
description: The Master’s programme in Arts and Culture Management from National Research University - Higher School of Economics (HSE) is designed to train future innovative and resilient leaders in the management of art, culture, creative industries and future entrepreneurs of the industry.
This MArch in Architecture from Leeds Beckett University is a creative, studio-focused course with a strong commitment to design research.

university: School of Film, Music and Performing Arts
description: There are increasing numbers of freelancers in sound design and this Sound Design course from Leeds Beckett University has been created to help those already working in the industry update their skills in the planning, generation and manipulation of audio soundtracks. At the same time, it meets the training requirements of those new to the field and will help develop and encourage fresh talent.

The MA Film Practice course from Arts University Bournemouth is for talented and emerging filmmakers seeking to learn through making, to look beyond the short film, to define themselves as artists within film practice and to gain that vital experience demanded by the industry.
Classical Music Performance (Guitar) at University of Pécs focuses on developing music performance skills and artistic qualities on the highest level possible
Gain employable skills in UX User-Experience and UI Interface at University of California, Berkeley by completing coursework at home — or from anywhere in the world!

The Illustration course from Arts University Bournemouth allows you to further refine your creative identity, offering a bridge between HE and professional illustration practice. It offers a great opportunity for creative professionals to return to university in order to reflect upon their creative practice and change direction.
The Music - Piano Pedagogy program at Wichita State University will help you take your musical talent and career to a higher level.

Built around a core of research-intensive creative investigation, the three-year, full-residency Studio concentration of the MFA in Art: Studio Practice degree at  Portland State University focuses on interdisciplinary experimentation and the exploration of ideas through the experience of making.

course: Final Examination in Professional Practice (Part 3) Architecture
university: Faculty of Creative and Cultural Industries
description: If you've studied architecture, surveying or civil engineering, and have completed RIBA parts 1 and 2, our Final Examination in Professional Practice (Part 3) Architecture course at University of Portsmouth is the final step in becoming a professional architect.

The MA Interior Design course at University of Central Lancashire (UCLan)  has been developed as a coherent part of the School of Art, Design and Fashion’s Masters Programmes and shares the same values and philosophies that unite them.

course: Professional Practice in Art and Design
description: Push the boundaries of creative expression by developing your existing practice in areas such as art, graphics, sculpture, filmmaking, animation, sound and curating with this Professional Practice in Art and Design from Leeds Beckett University.

If you want to pursue a design specialism within architecture, this MA in Architecture from Leeds Beckett University will help you develop an expert approach to architectural thinking and design execution.
The Certificate program in Entrepreneurship is offered to students by the University of Maryland Baltimore County.
The Master in Fashion and Luxury Business from EU Business School provides students with an insight into how to build and manage a luxury unique brand.
The MA Film course from University of South Wales offers students the opportunity to hone key skills for a variety of career options in the film and television industry.
Architecture - Accelerated Master's Program degree offered by the University of Arizona allows top undergraduates to continue in a graduate program in the same UA discipline.
During this programme, including a final 3 to 6 month internship, students become strong professionals thanks to an intensive project-based pedagogy, and a strong connection with the industry.
